Youtube to MP3 Converter

Python script which converts Youtube videos to .MP3 file.

  • Date: 31/12/2019
  • Category: Python

    • This script is used to download MP3 of your videos online. It makes use fo the youtube_dl import. The script is listed on my Github under the Python scripts Repository. The link can be found here.
